name: Borrowed Bones
description:
https://discord.gg/XsA5mYG

Borrowed bones is a blend between a turn based & realtime strategy card game where you steal the bones from the heroes to build your own dungeon.

This game was made for the Soulcube Super Sarturday game jam in the span of 2 days for the theme - Skeletal Party.

Hope you enjoy!

(Download or fullscreen to fix the massive mouse)
